## isKeyValue() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Returns if a given value is a [KeyValue](./mapping-template-compose.keyvalue.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isKeyValue(item: any): item is KeyValue;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  item | any |  |

**Returns:**

item is [KeyValue](./mapping-template-compose.keyvalue.md)

## Remarks

If this function returns `true`<!-- -->, `item` is narrowed to [KeyValue](./mapping-template-compose.keyvalue.md)<!-- -->.
